content: *these gloves are the perfect winter accessory knit with a simple cable adding elegance that matches any outfit throw these fingerless gloves on to keep hands toasty during any winter outing * snuggle fingerless gloves are worked in the round with a simple repeated cable pattern on the back of the hand this pattern is perfect for an adventurous beginner looking to learn how to cable and create a gusset **yarn** 100-131 yards of worsted weight yarn **recommended yarn** purl soho - partridge - 100% merino wool color shown lilac morning **suggested needles** size us 7 circular needles size us 7 double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge **gauge** 4 stitches x 5 row = 1 in stockinette stitch **notions** stitch markers cable knitting needle scissors tapestry needle **techniques** knitting in the round cables gusset
